name: Language Connect
tag_list: translation-services, interpreting-services, translation-agency, localization, social-media, seo-
overview:
At Language Connect we deliver 24-hour fast, accurate language translation services to national and international businesses, legal professions, the National Health Service and Government organisations.

We offer a range of solutions including translation, interpreting, localization, voiceovers and other language services in over 140 languages and dialects. With an international presence, Language Connect can guarantee a fast and professional response at all times.

Our credentials as a professional translation agency are underlined by our ISO 9001 accreditation and membership of two of the translation industry’s most prestigious associations, the Association of Translation Companies (ATC) and the Globalization And Localization Association (GALA).

We are an award-winning translation company for innovation. Language Connect is one of the only translation agencies to publicise a CSR policy and have award-winning ethical and sustainable practices.

If you need a reliable language translation service capable of understanding and responding quickly to your needs then Language Connect would be delighted to hear from you.
